doc.title: Reverting files
doc.section:
It is possible to revert changes done to a file. The file will then be reverted to the exact state it was in before you started working on it. This is done with the ‘Revert’ command.
How to revert files:
1.Select and right click on the file(s) you want to revert.
2.Select 'Revert' from the items menu.
Notice how the status icons in front of the files change from back to .
Ankhs output window will show all the files that have been reverted.
